summary: The document is a payroll certification for the U.S. House of Representatives' Select Committee on Assassinations, dated March 1977. It details the payroll for employees for the accounting period from February 1, 1977, to February 28, 1977, including employee names, social security numbers, positions, annual salaries, and gross pay for the period. It also contains certifications regarding the employees' performance of their official duties and their relationships with current Members of Congress.
key_findings: The document lists payroll information for employees of the Select Committee on Assassinations in the U.S. House of Representatives.
It covers the accounting period from February 1, 1977, to February 28, 1977.
Employees' annual salaries and gross pay for the period are detailed, along with their positions and social security numbers.
The document includes a certification that the employees performed their official duties and had no relationships with current Members of Congress unless otherwise noted.
